name: df-image
body: |- wceq(cimage(c0), cdif(cxp(universe, universe), crn(csymdif(ctxp(universe, cep), ctxp(ccom(cep, ccnv(c0)), universe)))))

comment: Define the image functor. This function takes a set ` A ` to a function ` x |-> ( A " x ) ` , providing that the latter exists. See ~ imageval for the derivation. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Mar-2014.)
